About Me

Let me tell you a little bit about myself and what I do...

Your Project is in Safe Hands

My name is Dr. Sandra Obiozo (B.Pharm, Pharm.D, mPSN), and I am a graduate of the Faculty of Pharmacy at the University of Benin. While my academic background is in pharmacy, my true passion lies in the creative realm. I am a dedicated graphic designer and UI/UX specialist with a keen eye for photography.
My journey in the creative world has been fueled by a love for visual storytelling and a desire to craft engaging experiences. I have always had a strong attention to detail, often noticing imperfections in designs—be it flyers, logos, billboards, or websites—and feeling compelled to correct or enhance them. I believe that great design not only looks good but also serves a purpose, and I strive to understand the unique needs of each client to deliver tailored solutions.
With a focus on innovation and detail, I create designs that resonate with audiences and elevate brands. Whether it’s developing intuitive user interfaces or capturing stunning images, my goal is to bring your vision to life through exceptional visual representation. I invite you to explore my portfolio and connect with me to discuss how we can collaborate to create something remarkable together.

Award One

Best Emerging Designer

Recognized for outstanding creativity and innovation in graphic design at the St Peter's Annual Creative Arts Festival 2023.

Award Two

Excellence in UI/UX Design

Awarded for exceptional user experience design in a client's project at the State Design Awards 2024.

Award Three

Outstanding Contribution To Visual Arts

Received for significant impact and contribution to the visual arts community, presented by the Arts Council of Edo state in 2023.
